data.text: @tjwhitfordnz @nzherald Because it the dribble they want you to read all the while the real issues are being covered up or not looked into
@nzherald So Hef had heart failure. Most people wondering if he was in "The Saddle" & overworked his ticker. I heard they couldn't get grin off face.
@nzherald The man was 91. Seriously, why is his cause of death news?
